named-query.name: Subscription.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Subscription s INNER JOIN s.userOrders o WHERE o.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: User.findBySubscriptionTypeAndDateBefore
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u INNER JOIN u.subOrders o INNTER JOIN o.subscription s WHERE s.type = :subType AND o.createdAt <= :subDate

named-query.name: User.findBySubscriptionTypeAndDateAfter
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u INNER JOIN u.subOrders o INNTER JOIN o.subscription s WHERE s.type = :subType AND o.createdAt > :subDate

named-query.name: User.findByDateBefore
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u INNER JOIN u.subOrders o WHERE o.createdAt <= :subDate

named-query.name: User.findByDateAfter
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u INNER JOIN u.subOrders o WHERE o.createdAt > :subDate
